/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/chusa_tf_node.dir/src/chusa_tf.cpp.o  -o /home/hmh/tf_test/devel/lib/chusa_tf/chusa_tf_node -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/melodic/lib /opt/ros/melodic/lib/libroscpp.so -lboost_filesystem -lboost_signals /opt/ros/melodic/lib/librosconsole.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/librosconsole_log4cxx.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/librosconsole_backend_interface.so -llog4cxx -lboost_regex /opt/ros/melodic/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/libroscpp_serialization.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/librostime.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/libcpp_common.so -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lboost_chrono -lboost_date_time -lboost_atomic -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libconsole_bridge.so.0.4
